title: paDitta mULai
sahitya:
paDitta mULai sumaiyAl unnaip-pArkkalAghumO paramA


anupallavi

  vaDitta kaNNum kuvitta kaiyum malarnda uLamum aruLum inrip-


caraNam    kuppai mEDu mEl uyarndu gOpuramAmO kuTramuLLa nenjil anbu kuDiyirukkumO appar pOl 
kaNNappar pOla aDaikkalam pughundu nIyE oppi nalgum toNDu sheidu nirppadanrikk-arpitamAm
